resources.string: Touch the NFC Card to your device !
Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.

Smart Biz Card Agreement:

 Non-public information – Refers to private information, this includes the information that a user provides when they sign up and information they received when receiving a virtual business card.
 Authorised Admin users – Refers to members that are developing, implementing, testing and maintaining the application and databases. The authorised admin user will therefore adhere to the Protection of Private Information Act, 2013.
 
 Protection of Non-public Information. You agree to:
 • To willingly provide contact details, name, surname, company name and business location.
 • Refrain from disclosing non-public information to anyone, except as permitted under those policies;
 • Reasonably safeguard your account against unauthorized access and use.
 
 Violation. You agree that, in case of a violation of this agreement, including improper access, use, or disclosure of non-public information:
 • You will report the violation immediately;
 • You will delete or otherwise destroy all non-public information in your possession and control, if instructed by authorised admin users;
 • Your access to non-public information may be terminated; and
 
 Other provisions. You also agree:
 • This agreement does not create an employment, agency, partnership, or joint venture relationship between you and authorised admin users and their partners.
 • You may not transfer or assign your rights or obligations under this agreement;
 • You are solely responsible for how you access and use non-public information, and your activity or account may be reviewed by other authorized admin users.
 • The laws of the Republic of South Africa will govern this agreement (without reference to conflict of laws principles).
 • Are18 years and older, hence legible to sign a legally binding agreement.
 
 By clicking “Accept” you acknowledge that you have read, reviewed and agree to the stated above.
